contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox prepared food | name = Hawaiian pizza | image = [[File:Pizza Hawaii 02.jpg|250px]] | caption = | alternate_name = | country = | region = | creator = | course = | type = [[Pizza]] | served = | main_ingredient = Pizza dough, [[cheese]], [[tomato sauce]], [[ham]], [[pineapple]] | variations = | calories = | other = }} {{pizza}} '''Hawaiian pizza''' is a type of [[pizza]] that always consists of a [[cheese]] and [[tomato]] base with toppings of [[ham]] and [[pineapple]].<ref>{{cite book |title=Dinner a Day: 365 Delicious Meals You Can Make in Minutes |last=Shirk |first=Lynette Rohrer |authorlink= |coauthors= |year=2010 |publisher=Adams Media |location= |isbn=144051531X |page=289 |pages= |url=http://books.google.com/books?id=iR98WZw4IZcC&pg=PT296&dq=hawaiian+pizza+ham+pineapple&hl=en&sa=X&ei=uG23UM9qisqpAcz5gegG&ved=0CDkQ6AEwBA |accessdate=November 2012}}</ref> Hawaiian pizza does not actually originate from Hawaii.<ref name="Cruise">{{cite book |title=The Belly Fat Cure: Discover the New Carb Swap System and Lose 4 to 9 Lbs. Every Week |last=Cruise |first=Jorge |authorlink= |coauthors= |year=2009 |publisher=Hay House, Inc. |location= |isbn=1401927181 |page=118 |pages= |url=http://books.google.com/books?id=8KSd2u8LD2MC&pg=PA118&dq=hawaiian+pizza&hl=en&sa=X&ei=iGu3UIu7B8LcqwGbvoDoCA&ved=0CEAQ6AEwAzgK#v=onepage&q=hawaiian%20pizza&f=false |accessdate=November 2012}}</ref> It has been conjectured that it derives from [[toast Hawaii]], a German sandwich<ref name="Cruise"/>. Versions will often have mixed peppers, mushrooms and bacon.{{Citation needed|date=January 2013}} Another variety consists of pineapple and [[Back bacon|Canadian bacon]].<ref>[http://papamurphys.com/OurMenu/Overview/Pizzas/Signature/Hawaiian Papa Murphy's, The Hawaiian Pizza]</ref> It is the most popular pizza in [[Australia]], accounting for 15% of pizza sales.<ref>{{cite journal |last=Green |first=Steve |year=1999 |title=PMQ GOES TO AUSTRALIA |journal=Pizza Marketing Quarterly |issue=Winter 1999 |oclc=173318468 |accessdate=13 November 2012 |url=http://pmq.com/mag/1999winter/win99_pmq_goes_australia.php}}</ref> ==See also== *{{portal-inline|Food}} ==References== {{reflist}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Hawaiian Pizza}} [[Category:Pizza]] {{Food-stub}} {{cuisine-stub}}
